hymn.title: Set your mind on the things which are above
hymn.chords: | C - Em - | Am - C/G - | F - Dm - | Gsus4 - G7 - | C - Em - | Am - C/G - | F - Dm - | G - C/E - | F - - - | G - - - | Em - - - | A7 - - - | Dm - - - | Fm/D - G7 | C - F/C - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: Set your mind on the things which are a -- bove, Not on the things which are on the earth. For I died, for I died, And my life is hid -- den With Christ, with Christ in God.

lyrics.stanza: Set your mind on the things which are above, Not on the things which are on the earth. For I died, for I died, And my life is hidden With Christ, with Christ in God.
